title: Authors and Citation
text: Ricardo Semião. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Semião R (2024). varr: Utility Functions VAR Models. https://https://github.com/ricardo-semiao/varr, https://ricardo-semiao.github.io/varr/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {varr: Utility Functions for VAR Models},   author = {Ricardo Semião},   year = {2024},   note = {https://https://github.com/ricardo-semiao/varr, https://ricardo-semiao.github.io/varr/}, }

title: Utility Functions for VAR Models
text: varr R package developed provide general utility functions projects involving Vector Auto-Regressive models, specifically vars package. Disclaimer: package early stage life. hasn’t thoroughly tested can present several bugs. don’t recommend using large-scale projects, yet. Please report problems email () github issue. Thank ! Author: Ricardo Semião e Castro (ricardo.semiao@outlook).

title: Utility Functions for VAR Models
text: Mainly, functions retrieve results vars objects, manipulate tidyverse, plot commonly needed ggplot graphs, realm IRF’s, FEVD’s, predict graphs, VAR series residual analysis. future, intent add functions quick (thorough) analysis retrieval trends, seasonality, structural breaks, using common methods statistical tests. Additionally, want expand package VAR-like objects.

title: Utility Functions for VAR Models
text: can install development version varr GitHub :
code: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("ricardo-semiao/varr")

title: Utility Functions for VAR Models
text: Specially “setup” suite, vardiff package. Specify hat errors expect expect_error calls. Directly test elements ggplots returned functions. tests specifically test_fun(). Add tests “helper” “setup” functions. Rethink test functions list scheme. Change “args_…” “…_args” arguments names Change “serie(s)” naming “var(s)” “col(s)” Change names internal faceting variables Give hints work results. Direct used methods like “see: ?vars:::predict”. Additional: Add package data custom examples Solve less important lintr notes. Study importing whole rlang ggplot2.

title: Utility Functions for VAR Models
text: package: Using styler lintr packages style consistency. Uses testthat vdiffr automate tests. Uses rlang frameworks tidy eval rlang errors.

what: Find build information of a ggplot — get_gg_info
title: Find build information of a ggplot — get_gg_info
text: customize plot made package, adding new layers, useful see data mappings used. function returns list .

title: Find build information of a ggplot — get_gg_info
code: get_gg_info(graph)

title: Find build information of a ggplot — get_gg_info
text: graph ggplot analyze.

title: Find build information of a ggplot — get_gg_info
text: list two entries: main_data: data used ggplot(). layers: layer aesthetic mapping data used (can 'inherited').

title: Find build information of a ggplot — get_gg_info
Plot autocorrelation and similar — ggvar_acf
text: Given dataset VAR model get residuals , ggvar_acf plots auto-correlations (similar) call every series. ggvar_ccf plots cross-correlations (similar) series, grid.

title: Plot autocorrelation and similar — ggvar_acf
code: ggvar_acf(   x,   series = NULL,   lag.max = NULL,   type = "correlation",   graph_type = "segment",   args_type = list(),   args_ribbon = list(linetype = 2, color = "blue", fill = NA),   args_hline = list(yintercept = 0),   args_labs = list(),   args_facet = list(),   ci = 0.95,   ... )  ggvar_ccf(   x,   series = NULL,   lag.max = NULL,   type = "correlation",   graph_type = "segment",   args_type = list(),   args_ribbon = list(linetype = 2, color = "blue", fill = NA),   args_hline = list(yintercept = 0),   args_labs = list(),   args_facet = list(),   facet_type = "ggplot",   ci = 0.95,   ... )

title: Plot autocorrelation and similar — ggvar_acf
text: x dataset (object coercible "data.frame") "varest" object get residuals . series character vector series (variables)  consider. Defaults (NULL). lag.max number lags used calculate ACF, passed acf. type type ACF computed. Can either "correlation", "covariance", "partial". Passed acf. graph_type ggplot geom used create plot: texts_vec. args_type Arguments passed 'geom' chosen graph_type. args_ribbon, args_hline Additional arguments passed geom_ribbon geom_hline (respectively). See 'Customization' section. args_labs Additional arguments passed labs. empty list, changed default values. args_facet Additional arguments passed faceting engine used. ci confidence level confidence interval. Set FALSE omit. Used geom_ribbon. ... Arguments passed methods, see 'Methods' section. facet_type facet 'engine' used. 'ggplot2' ggplot2::facet_grid, 'ggh4x' ggh4x::facet_grid2.

title: Plot autocorrelation and similar — ggvar_acf
text: ggplot.

title: Plot autocorrelation and similar — ggvar_acf
text: graph can customized 'static' arguments passed layer -- using args_* arguments --, , applicable, 'dynamic' aesthetics -- using args_aes argument. built, result can customized ggplot, adding overwriting layers ggplot's +. useful understand data mappings coded package, using function get_gg_info. See vignette('customizing-graphs') details.

title: Plot autocorrelation and similar — ggvar_acf
text: data x extracted generic function texts_vec. class conditions external function pass ... arguments . list currently implemented classes: Class 'varest': passed stats::acf. Class 'default': passed stats::acf.

title: Plot autocorrelation and similar — ggvar_acf
code: ggvar_acf(freeny[-2], args_facet = list(scales = "free_y"))  ggvar_ccf(freeny[-2], args_facet = list(scales = "free_y"))  ggvar_acf(vars::VAR(freeny[-2]), args_facet = list(scales = "free_y"))

title: Plot VAR Residuals Distribution — ggvar_dist

title: Plot VAR Residuals Distribution — ggvar_dist
text: x "varest" object. series character vector variables consider. Defaults (NULL). bins interger. number histogram bins, passed geom_histogram. palette vector colors (bins, normal curve). See vignette("palettes"). size interger. size normal curve line, passed geom_line. ... Aditional arguments passed geom_histogram.

text: object class ggplot.

title: Plot VAR Residuals Distribution — ggvar_dist
code: ggvar_dist(vars::VAR(EuStockMarkets))

Arguments passed methods, see 'Methods' section.

Used irf. args_line, args_hline, args_ribbon Additional arguments passed geom_line, geom_hline, geom_ribbon (respectively). See 'Customization' section. args_labs Additional arguments passed labs. empty list, changed default values. args_facet Additional arguments passed faceting engine used. facet_type facet 'engine' used. title: Plot VAR predictions — ggvar_predict
text: Gets predictions via stats::predict plots . Can also plot known values past.

title: Plot VAR predictions — ggvar_predict
code: ggvar_predict(   x,   series = NULL,   index_ahead,   index_behind = NULL,   ci = 0.95,   args_aes = list(),   args_line = list(),   args_ribbon = list(fill = NA, linetype = 2, color = "blue"),   args_labs = list(),   args_facet = list(),   ... )

title: Plot VAR predictions — ggvar_predict
text: x "varest" object get predictions . series character vector series (variables)  consider. Defaults (NULL). index_ahead vector labels x-axis, normally dates. Applied predicted portion graph. length define prediction horizon. index_behind vector labels x-axis, normally dates. Applied original portion graph. length define 'past' horizon. Leave NULL plot predicted values. ci confidence level confidence interval. Set FALSE omit. Used predict. args_aes Defines aesthetics differentiate data. named list aesthetics names (*) -- arguments passed ggplot2::scale_*_manual. See 'Customization' section. args_line, args_ribbon Additional arguments passed geom_line geom_ribbon (respectively). See 'Customization' section. args_labs Additional arguments passed labs. empty list, changed default values. args_facet Additional arguments passed faceting engine used. ... Arguments passed methods, see 'Methods' section.

text: ggplot.

text: graph can customized 'static' arguments passed layer -- using args_* arguments --, , applicable, 'dynamic' aesthetics -- using args_aes argument. args_aes list '* = arguments scale_*_manual \ elements, '*' represents name aesthetic apply \ data. View vignette('ggplot2-specs', 'ggplot2') see available \ aesthetics. built, result can customized ggplot, adding overwriting layers ggplot's +. useful understand data mappings coded package, using function get_gg_info. See vignette('customizing-graphs') details.

code: x <- vars::VAR(freeny[-2]) ggvar_predict(x, NULL, 1:10, 0:-10, args_facet = list(scales = "free_y")) #> Warning: Some aesthetic must have its 'values' defined in `args_aes`. Setting #> `args_aes$color$values` to "'ggplot'".

"AIC", "HQ", "SC", "FPE". trans transformation apply criteria result (vector). Can function, "none" (default), "index" create index numbers. args_aes Defines aesthetics differentiate data. named list aesthetics names (*) -- arguments passed ggplot2::scale_*_manual. See 'Customization' section. args_line Additional arguments passed geom_line (respectively). what: Plot Values of Dataset or VAR Residuals — ggvar_values
title: Plot Values of Dataset or VAR Residuals — ggvar_values
text: Plots historic values variables dataset, residuals VAR  model. ggvar_values Plots series facet.  ggvar_values_colored plots graph,  different color.

title: Plot Values of Dataset or VAR Residuals — ggvar_values
code: ggvar_values(   x,   series = NULL,   index = NULL,   args_line = list(),   args_facet = list() )  ggvar_values_colored(   x,   series = NULL,   index = NULL,   colors = NULL,   args_line = list() )

title: Plot Values of Dataset or VAR Residuals — ggvar_values
text: x Either "varest" object plotting residuals, dataset (object coercible data.frame) numeric variables. series character vector variables (column names) consider. Defaults (NULL). index vector labels x-axis, normally dates. Must  length equal x$obs nrow(x). Defaults numeric sequence. args_line Aditional arguments passed geom_line. args_facet Aditional arguments passed facet_wrap. colors vector colors variable. Passed toscale_color_manual. See vignette("colors").

title: Plot Values of Dataset or VAR Residuals — ggvar_values
text: object class ggplot.

title: Plot Values of Dataset or VAR Residuals — ggvar_values
code: ggvar_values(freeny[-2], args_facet = list(scales = "free_y"))  ggvar_values_colored(freeny[-2])  ggvar_values(vars::VAR(freeny[-2]), args_facet = list(scales = "free_y"))

what: varr: Utility Functions for VAR Models — varr-package
title: varr: Utility Functions for VAR Models — varr-package
text: Utility functions VAR models. Currently, ggplots objects like like IRF's, FEVD's, predict graphs, residual analysis. Soon contain functions common tests statistics, support VAR-like objects, unified builders vector regression models.

title: varr: Utility Functions for VAR Models — varr-package
text: Maintainer: Ricardo Semião ricardo.semiao@outlook.com

what: varr: Utility Functions for VAR Analisys — varr-package
title: varr: Utility Functions for VAR Analisys — varr-package
text: Functions commonly needed ggplot graphs Vector Auto-Regressive models, like IRF's, FEVD's, predict graphs, VAR residual analysis. Soon contain functions common tests statistics, VAR-like objects.

title: varr: Utility Functions for VAR Analisys — varr-package
text: Maintainer: Ricardo Semião ricardo.semiao@outlook.com

title: varr (development version)
text: 25/07/2024 - Major refactoring codebase. 11/13/2023 - Remade code styling styler lintr, created setup helpers (“setup_ggvar_…”). 11/10/2023 - Added testthat (& vdiffr) basic tests. 11/06/2023 - Initial update github (development version, yet tested CRAN suitable).
